body_html:
There are no unit tests for the old _apply() (or public-facing apply(), for that matter). So I omit testing for now.

Bugs should be caught by the various tests for half(), etc (as well as my manual testing with ELF code).
body_text:
There are no unit tests for the old _apply() (or public-facing apply(), for that matter). So I omit testing for now.
Bugs should be caught by the various tests for half(), etc (as well as my manual testing with ELF code).
body:
There are no unit tests for the old ``_apply()`` (or public-facing ``apply()``, for that matter). So I omit testing for now.

Bugs should be caught by the various tests for ``half()``, etc (as well as my manual testing with ELF code).
